Class ShowRecordsController

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.ui.controllers.ShowRecordsController
public class ShowRecordsController extends Object
Controller for handling record display and manipulation.

  • Method Details

    • getSortedRecords

      public List<Record> getSortedRecords(boolean ascending, int page)
      Retrieves a paginated list of records, sorted by date.
      Parameters:
      ascending - Specifies the sorting order; true for ascending, false for descending.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of records for the specified page.

    • getRecordsByDate

      public List<Record> getRecordsByDate(DateAndTime date, int page)
      Retrieves a paginated list of records for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which records are to be fetched.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of records that match the given date on the specified page.

    • getRecordsByCategory

      public List<Record> getRecordsByCategory(String category, int page)
      Retrieves a paginated list of records for a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category for which records are to be fetched.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of records that belong to the given category on the specified page.

    • deleteRecordById

      public boolean deleteRecordById(Long id)
      Deletes a record by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the record to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the record was found and deleted, false otherwise.
